dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1953
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Ill and ordered to rest she reflects on sickness, life, and death. Tales of life at Peter Maurin farm--the gift of 45 chickens, a blizzard, and smog.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 660 1953-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
